title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, October 15, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of humorist P.G. Wodehouse (1881), who made his novels "like musical comedies without the music, ignoring real life completely."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of humorist P.G. Wodehouse (1881), who made his novels "like musical comedies without the music, ignoring real life completely."
